Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

License.description: The License schema describes a license for the specified feature.
License.longDescription: This resource shall represent a license for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Contact.longDescription: This property shall contain an object containing information about the contact of the license.

DownloadURI.description: The URI at which to download the license file.
DownloadURI.longDescription: This property shall contain the URI at which to download the license file, using the Redfish protocol and authentication methods.  The Service provides this URI for the download of the OEM-specific binary file of license data.  An HTTP GET from this URI shall return a response payload of MIME time `application/octet-stream`.

ExpirationDate.description: The date when the license expires.
ExpirationDate.longDescription: This property shall contain the date when the license is expired.

GracePeriodDays.description: The grace days of this license.
GracePeriodDays.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the number of days that the license is still usable after the ExpirationDate.

InstallDate.description: The date when the license is installed.
InstallDate.longDescription: This property shall contain the date when the license is installed.

LicenseInfoURI.description: The URI at which to describe the license.
LicenseInfoURI.longDescription: This property shall contain the URI at which to provide more information about the license. It is generic URI not tied to specific user.

LicenseOrigin.description: This indicates how the license was installed.
LicenseOrigin.longDescription: This property shall contain the origin for this license.

LicenseScope.description: The authorization scope of the license.
LicenseScope.longDescription: This property shall contain the authorization scope of the license.

LicenseType.longDescription: This property shall contain the type for the license.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

RemainingDuration.description: The remaining length of time before the license expires.
RemainingDuration.longDescription: This property shall contain the remaining length of time before the license expires.

RemainingUseCount.description: The number of remaining use count.
RemainingUseCount.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of remaining use count.

Removable.description: An indication of whether a user can remove the license.
Removable.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether a user can remove the license via a delete operation.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of the license.
SerialNumber.longDescription: This property shall contain a number that identifies the license.

Status.longDescription: This property shall contain the status of license.

Vendor.longDescription: This property shall contain the information about the licensor of the license.

LicenseScope.longDescription: This type shall contain the properties about the license authorization scope and limit.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AuthorizationType.longDescription: This property shall contain the type of license authorization.

AuthorizedDeviceList.description: An array of links to devices authorized by the license.
AuthorizedDeviceList.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of links to devices that are authorized by the license. It is provided only when the AuthorizationType is Device.

MaxNumberOfDevices.description: The number of devices authorized by the license.
MaxNumberOfDevices.longDescription: This property shall contain the number of devices that are authorized by the license. It is provided when the AuthorizationType is Capacity.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #License.v1_0_0.License
